name: NuCoin
description:
Cryptocurrency

Cryptocurrency is commonly discussed and continually researched. So why is information about volatile markets not reaching those most involved in crypto?

A Potential Solution

NuCoin is an educational-political desktop simulator meant to provide players with a more immediate and practical understanding of cryptocurrency with the use of a fictional cryptocurrency constructed with real-world data.

This serious game was created by three students in the University of Utah undergraduate Games program (EAE):

Kyle Johnson: Lead Programmer, UI Artist, Designer. Kyle has several independent credits and a popular art social media presence (LinkedIn).

Will Loxley: Producer, Lead Researcher, Designer. Will is pursuing undergraduate disability and labor equity research for the games industry (LinkedIn).

Justin Sundermeyer: Composer, Artist, Designer. Justin is focused on music production and has an internship for Summer 2022 (LinkedIn).

Controls

Interact: Left Click
Leave Screen: Click off box
